TableField.name: ExpenditureID
TableField.phrase: Record ID|An automatically assigned number used to track expenditures made from trust accounts

TableField.name: TrustDistributionID
TableField.phrase: From Account|The trust distribution account to be debited

ForeignField.name: TrustAccountID
ForeignField.phrase: Trust Account ID|A unique number used to identify the trust account

ForeignField.name: OrganizationID
ForeignField.phrase: From Organization|The organization responsible for funding and managing the trust distribution account

ForeignField.name: Organization
ForeignField.phrase: Organization|The organization responsible for funding and managing the trust distribution account

ForeignField.name: AccountName
ForeignField.phrase: Account|A unique name or title used to identify the trust distribution account

ForeignField.name: AccountNumber
ForeignField.phrase: Account|A unique number used to identify the trust distribution account

ForeignField.name: AccountDesc
ForeignField.phrase: Account Description|A detailed description of the trust distribution account
ForeignField.sample: This account is utilized by employees as a discretionary fund to improve business methods, processes or conditions

ForeignField.name: TrustedPersonID
ForeignField.phrase: From Person|The name of the individual transferring the amount to a different trust distribution account
ForeignField.sample: This account is utilized by employees as a discretionary fund to improve business methods, processes or conditions

ForeignField.name: TrustedPerson
ForeignField.phrase: Person|The name of the individual transferring the amount to a different trust distribution account

ForeignField.name: DistAcctNumber
ForeignField.phrase: Account Number|A combined field used to generate a unique distribution account number

ForeignField.name: TrustDistribution
ForeignField.sample: Mattias Thorslund Risk Control Account; MTT-2004-01; Active

TableField.name: ProcessObstacleTypeID
TableField.phrase: Obstacle Type|The specific type of business process that has become an obstacle to process improvement

CodeField.name: ProcessObstacleType
CodeField.phrase: Obstacle Type|The specific type of business process that has become an obstacle to process improvement

TableField.name: ObstacleDesc
TableField.phrase: Obstacle Description|A detailed description of the process obstacle being overcome by the use of this trust account
TableField.sample: The Maintenance Department has placed a low priority on repairing floor. Work order number 253 was issued six months ago the we have incurred two injuries since that time due to the condition of the floor

TableField.name: ExpenseDate
TableField.phrase: Expense Date|The specific date the expense occurred

TableField.name: ExpenseAmount
TableField.phrase: Amount|The amount of the expense, stated in the currency assigned to this installation of the software

RemoteField.name: PayeePersonID
RemoteField.phrase: Payee Person|The name of the individual receiving payment

ForeignField.name: PayeePerson
ForeignField.phrase: Payee Person|The name of the individual receiving payment

TableField.name: ExpenseTitle
TableField.phrase: Expense Title|A brief title used to describe the expense paid from the trust distribution account

TableField.name: ExpenseDesc
TableField.phrase: Expense Description|A detailed description of the expense paid from the trust distribution account
TableField.sample: The vendor replaced the floor coating within the 40 Degree Room to prevent slips and falls.

TableField.name: ExpensePaymentApproachID
TableField.phrase: Payment Approach|Whether the payment approach was from an individual trust account or a team account

CodeField.name: ExpensePaymentApproach
CodeField.phrase: Payment Approach|Whether the payment approach was from an individual trust account or a team account

TableField.name: ExpensePaymentMethodID
TableField.phrase: Payment Method|The method used to pay the expense

CodeField.name: ExpensePaymentMethod
CodeField.phrase: Payment Method|The method used to pay the expense

TableField.name: TransactionDocNumber
TableField.phrase: Payment Document Number|The type and number associated with the payment document (e.g. Personal Check (562)

CombinedField.name: RecordLabel
CombinedField.phrase: Record Description|A combined field used to describe the payment when associating it with other records
CombinedField.sample: Active Agenda, Sweden | Mattias Thorslund Risk Control Account | 01-02-2004 | 1,000.00

CombinedField.name: Expenditure
CombinedField.phrase: Expenditure|A combined field used to describe the payment when associating it with other records
CombinedField.sample: Active Agenda, Sweden | Mattias Thorslund Risk Control Account | 01-02-2004 | 1,000.00

Daniel Zahlis Risk Control Account; DFZ-2004-01; Active
Jane Doe Risk Control Account; JAD-2004-01; Active
Larry Hansen Risk Control Account; LLH-2004-01; Active

DocumentationSection.title: Introduction
DocumentationSection.p: The installation-specific introduction to the scope and purpose of this module should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said to introduce this module. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.

DocumentationSection.title: Implementation
DocumentationSection.p: Installation-specific implementation rules, policies, practices should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said about implementating this module. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.

DocumentationSection.title: People Elements
DocumentationSection.p: Installation-specific information regarding the way this module impacts people should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said about how this module impacts, or is impacted by, people in general. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.

DocumentationSection.title: Barriers to success
DocumentationSection.p: Installation-specific barriers to success in implemeting this module should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said about barriers to success associated with the subject matter of this module. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.

DocumentationSection.p: Installation-specific data collection methods, locations, and resources should be entered here. DocumentationSection.p: Installation-specific data input methods, permissions, and requirements should be entered here. DocumentationSection.p: Installation-specific knowledge application methods should be entered here. DocumentationSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions
DocumentationSection.p: Installation-specific questions that are frequently asked of administrators or implementers should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see the types of questions collected, and answers provided, by the Active Agenda community relating to the subject matter of this module.
